title: Learn AMP by Example
name: AMPHTML
desc: A hands-on introduction to Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP) focusing on code and live samples. Learn how to create AMP pages and see examples for all AMP components.

categories.description: Get started with AMP and learn how to build your first AMP page.
categories.name: Introduction

examples.title: Hello World
examples.name: _Hello_World
examples.description: An AMP HTML tutorial - learn the different building blocks of an AMP HTML file.

examples.title: How to publish AMPs
examples.name: _How_to_publish_AMPs
examples.description: There are a few things you need to watch out for when publishing Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP).

examples.title: AMP for E-Commerce Getting Started
examples.name: AMP_for_E-Commerce_Getting_Started
examples.description: Here is a quick getting started guide for creating e-commerce webpages with AMP.

examples.title: Internationalization
examples.name: Internationalization
examples.description: How to support hreflang and internationalization with AMP.

categories.description: AMP components in action. Learn how to build AMPs using the built-in components.
categories.name: Components

examples.title: amp-access-laterpay
examples.name: amp-access-laterpay
examples.description: amp-access-laterpay allows publishers to easily integrate with the payment infrastructure platform LaterPay.

examples.title: amp-access
examples.name: amp-access
examples.description: The amp-access component adds support for paywalls and subscriptions to AMP, allowing the publisher to control which content is accessible by the reader and with what restrictions.

examples.title: amp-accordion
examples.name: amp-accordion
examples.description: An accordion provides a way for viewers to have a glance at the outline of the content and jump to a section or their choice at their will.

examples.title: amp-ad
examples.name: amp-ad
examples.description: How to display Ads in your AMP HTML files.

examples.title: amp-analytics
examples.name: amp-analytics
examples.description: The amp-analytics element can be used to measure activity on an AMP document.

examples.title: amp-anim
examples.name: amp-anim
examples.description: Embed animations (gif, webp) into your AMP HTML files.

examples.title: amp-app-banner
examples.name: amp-app-banner
examples.description: amp-app-banner provides a minimal UI for a cross-platform, fixed-position banner showing a call-to-action to install an app.

metadata.comment: Don't install serviceworker as canonical domain is different that serviceworker domain

examples.title: amp-audio
examples.name: amp-audio
examples.description: AMP replaces the HTML5 audio tag with its own version: amp-audio.

examples.title: amp-bind
examples.name: amp-bind
examples.description: amp-bind   allows you to add custom interactivity to your pages beyond   using AMP's pre-built components.

examples.title: amp-brid-player
examples.name: amp-brid-player
examples.description: Embed Brid Player videos in your AMP HTML files.

examples.title: amp-brightcove
examples.name: amp-brightcove
examples.description: The amp-brightcove component allows embedding a Brightcove   Video Cloud or   Perform player.

examples.title: amp-call-tracking
examples.name: amp-call-tracking
examples.description: amp-call-tracking replaces static phone numbers with dynamically generated phone numbers used for call tracking analytics.

examples.title: amp-carousel
examples.name: amp-carousel
examples.description: The amp-carousel component allows displaying multiple similar pieces of content along a horizontal   axis.

examples.title: amp-dailymotion
examples.name: amp-dailymotion
examples.description: Embed daily motion videos into your AMP HTML files.

examples.title: amp-date-picker
examples.name: amp-date-picker
examples.description: amp-date-picker is an AMP component which allows to select a single date or a range of dates.

examples.title: amp-dynamic-css-classes
examples.name: amp-dynamic-css-classes
examples.description: AMP's dynamic CSS classes provided by the amp-dynamic-css-class tag enable boolean logic for a handful of conditions

examples.title: amp-experiment
examples.name: amp-experiment
examples.description: The  amp-experiment component allows to perform user experience experiments on an AMP document and collect resulting data.

examples.title: amp-facebook
examples.name: amp-facebook
examples.description: The amp-facebook component allows embedding both posts and videos into AMP files.

examples.title: amp-fit-text
examples.name: amp-fit-text
examples.description: amp-fit-text enables you to manage the size and fit of text within a given area.

examples.title: amp-font
examples.name: amp-font
examples.description: Learn how to use the amp-font component to trigger and monitor the loading of custom fonts on AMP pages.

examples.title: amp-form
examples.name: amp-form
examples.description: The amp-form extension allows   the usage of forms and input fields in an AMP document.

examples.title: amp-fx-flying-carpet
examples.name: amp-fx-flying-carpet
examples.description: amp-fx-flying-carpet displays its children inside a container of fixed height.

examples.title: amp-fx-parallax
examples.name: amp-fx-parallax
examples.description: The amp-fx-parallax extension allows an element to move as if it is nearer or farther relative to the foreground of the page content.

examples.title: amp-gfycat
examples.name: amp-gfycat
examples.description: Use the amp-gfycat component to embed animated GIFs from gfycat in your AMP HTML files.

examples.title: amp-gist
examples.name: amp-gist
examples.description: The amp-gist component allows embedding of an entire gist or a single file.

examples.title: amp-google-vrview-image
examples.name: amp-google-vrview-image
examples.description: The amp-google-vrview-image extension allows embedding 360 degree VR media into AMP pages.

examples.title: amp-hulu
examples.name: amp-hulu
examples.description: Use the amp-hulu component to embed Hulu videos into AMP files.

examples.title: amp-iframe
examples.name: amp-iframe
examples.description: Use amp-iframe for embedding content into AMP files via iframe.

examples.title: amp-ima-video
examples.name: amp-ima-video
examples.description: amp-ima-video   embeds a video player for instream video ads that are integrated with the   IMA SDK.

examples.title: amp-image-lightbox
examples.name: amp-image-lightbox
examples.description: The amp-image-lightbox component allows the user to expand an image to fill the viewport.

examples.title: amp-img
examples.name: amp-img
examples.description: AMP HTML files don't support the normal HTML img tag.

examples.title: amp-instagram
examples.name: amp-instagram
examples.description: Embed instagram videos and photos into your AMP HTML files.

examples.title: amp-install-serviceworker
examples.name: amp-install-serviceworker
examples.description: The amp-install-serviceworker   component enables service worker installation via same origin or via the Google AMP Cache.

examples.title: amp-jwplayer
examples.name: amp-jwplayer
examples.description: Embed jwplayer videos in your AMP HTML files.

examples.title: amp-kaltura-player
examples.name: amp-kaltura-player
examples.description: Embed Kaltura videos in your AMP HTML files.

examples.title: amp-lightbox
examples.name: amp-lightbox
examples.description: The amp-lightbox component allows for a “lightbox” or similar experience - where upon user   interaction a component expands to fill the viewport, until it is closed again by the user.

examples.title: amp-list
examples.name: amp-list
examples.description: The amp-list component fetches dynamic content from a CORS JSON endpoint and renders it using a supplied template.

examples.title: amp-live-list
examples.name: amp-live-list
examples.description: The amp-live-list component adds support for publishing live updates to AMP pages as new content becomes available in the source document.

examples.title: amp-mustache
examples.name: amp-mustache
examples.description: amp-mustache templates are a simple, structured templating system based on mustache.

examples.title: amp-o2-player
examples.name: amp-o2-player
examples.description: Embed o2 player in your AMP HTML files.

examples.title: amp-pinterest
examples.name: amp-pinterest
examples.description: The amp-pinterest component allows embedding a Pin It button or pin widget.

examples.title: amp-pixel
examples.name: amp-pixel
examples.description: amp-pixel is a lightweight mechanism for measuring pageviews.

examples.title: amp-reach-player
examples.name: amp-reach-player
examples.description: Embed videos hosted on Beachfront Reach in your AMP HTML files.

examples.title: amp-selector
examples.name: amp-selector
examples.description: amp-selector lets the user choose from a list of options.

examples.title: amp-sidebar
examples.name: amp-sidebar
examples.description: A sidebar provides a way to display meta content intended for temporary access (navigation links, buttons, menus, etc.).

examples.title: amp-social-share
examples.name: amp-social-share
examples.description: The Social Share extension provides a common interface for share buttons, styled to complement each other.

examples.title: amp-soundcloud
examples.name: amp-soundcloud
examples.description: Play soundcloud tracks from within AMP HTML files.

examples.title: amp-springboard-player
examples.name: amp-springboard-player
examples.description: Embed videos hosted on the Springboard Video Platform in your AMP HTML files.

examples.title: amp-sticky-ad
examples.name: amp-sticky-ad
examples.description: amp-sticky-ad adds support for ad units that always take a fixed place in the viewport in your AMP HTML files.

examples.title: amp-timeago
examples.name: amp-timeago
examples.description: The amp-timeago provides fuzzy timestamps by formatting dates as "X time ago"

examples.title: amp-twitter
examples.name: amp-twitter
examples.description: Embed tweets into your AMP HTML files.

examples.title: amp-user-notification
examples.name: amp-user-notification
examples.description: Use amp-user-notification to display a dismissable notification to the user.

examples.title: amp-video
examples.name: amp-video
examples.description: Embed videos into your AMP HTML files.

examples.name: amp-vimeo
examples.description: Embed Vimeo videos in your AMP HTML files.

examples.description: Embed Vine videos in your AMP HTML files.

examples.title: amp-youtube

examples.description: Use amp-user-notification to display a dismissable notification to the user.

examples.description: Click-to-play is a common UX feature for video players on the web.

examples.title: ComboBox
examples.name: ComboBox
examples.description: This sample demonstrastes a classic dropdown combo, with a text field which filters the dropdown elements    according to the user's input.

examples.title: Custom Loading Indicators
examples.name: Custom_Loading_Indicators
examples.description: While the AMP runtime fetches content from endpoints, it will display a loading indicator.

examples.title: Favorite Button
examples.name: Favorite_Button
examples.description: This sample demonstrates how to implement a favorite/like/bookmark button in AMP.

examples.title: Geolocation with amp-list
examples.name: Geolocation_with_amp-list
examples.description: While the AMP Caches don't offer support for geolocation, you can enable   geo-based features with geolocation logic on your backend and   amp-list.

examples.title: How to support Images with unknown Dimensions?
examples.name: How_to_support_Images_with_unknown_Dimensions%3F
examples.description: This sample demonstrates how it is possible to embed images with unknown dimensions into an AMP page while maintaining the correct aspect ratio.

examples.title: Image Galleries with amp-carousel
examples.name: Image_Galleries_with_amp-carousel
examples.description: The amp-carousel component works great for image galleries.

examples.title: Integrating Videos in AMP an Overview
examples.name: Integrating_Videos_in_AMP_an_Overview
examples.description: There many different ways to integrate videos in AMP HTML files.

examples.title: Layout System
examples.name: Layout_System
examples.description: There are a number of tools in AMP and CSS to make responsive documents.

examples.title: Linked Dropdowns
examples.name: Linked_Dropdowns
examples.description: These linked dropdowns are implemented using AMP components.

examples.title: Long List of amp-instagram Embeds
examples.name: Long_List_of_amp-instagram_Embeds
examples.description: A page with a long list of amp-instagram embeds to show how fast and responsive AMP pages are, this example contains 15 amp-instagram embeds.

examples.title: Paged List
examples.name: Paged_List
examples.description: Often, users requests data that could fill multiple pages of content, so   web applications must provide a way for users to navigate across pages of   data.

examples.title: Payments in AMP
examples.name: Payments_in_AMP
examples.description: Via amp-iframe and the allowpaymentrequest attribute, AMP pages can support requesting payment information directly from the browser.

examples.title: Rich Media Notifications
examples.name: Rich_Media_Notifications
examples.description: Media notifications are one of the most common ways users control media   playback on mobile devices.

examples.title: Show More Button
examples.name: Show_More_Button
examples.description: This is a sample showing how to implement the "show more" design pattern.

examples.title: Star Rating
examples.name: Star_Rating
examples.description: This star rating widget is implemented using only CSS, given AMP's restriction on custom JavaScript.

examples.title: Tab Panels with amp-selector
examples.name: Tab_Panels_with_amp-selector
examples.description: This is a implementation of tab panels that uses amp-selector.

examples.title: Using the AMP URL API
examples.name: Using_the_AMP_URL_API
examples.description: The AMP URL API retrieves the matching AMP URLs for a given list of URLs.

examples.title: Using the Google AMP Cache
examples.name: Using_the_Google_AMP_Cache
examples.description: The Google AMP Cache stores valid AMPs and provides a consistently fast access to AMPs.

examples.title: Video Carousels with amp-carousel
examples.name: Video_Carousels_with_amp-carousel
examples.description: The amp-carousel component works not only great for image galleries, but also for video galleries.

examples.title: Dynamic Content After User-Interaction
examples.name: Dynamic_Content_After_User-Interaction
examples.description: This is a sample showing how to show dynamic content after an user interaction: the product availability will be shown based on product selection.

examples.title: How to embed interactive elements on AMP pages?
examples.name: How_to_embed_interactive_elements_on_AMP_pages%3F
examples.description: This samples demonstrates how to embed interactive charts into AMP files.

examples.title: Mixing Dynamic and Cached Data
examples.name: Mixing_Dynamic_and_Cached_Data
examples.description: This is a sample showing how to integrate product data details such as description, price, availability etc with different data freshness requirements.

examples.title: Multi Page Flow
examples.name: Multi_Page_Flow
examples.description: This sample demonstrates different approaches for how to implement a multi-step flow in AMP.

examples.title: Animated Snackbar
examples.name: Animated_Snackbar
examples.description: Snackbars provide brief feedback about an operation through a message at the bottom of the screen.

examples.title: Basics of scrollbound effects
examples.name: Basics_of_scrollbound_effects
examples.description: amp-position-observer   combined with amp-animation is   a powerful building block that can handle various uses-cases such as scrollbound animations,   parallax effects and transitions as elements enter and exit the viewport.

examples.title: Scroll to top
examples.name: Scroll_to_top
examples.description: amp-position-observer   combined with amp-animation can be used to   implement a scroll to top button.

name: AMPHTML ads
title: AMPHTML ads by Example
desc: Learn how to create AMPHTML ads. AMPHTML ads are ads built using AMP-HTML and use many of the same AMP components that make AMP pages performant and safe.

categories.description: Getting started with AMPHTML ads and how they work.
categories.name: Introduction

examples.title: Hello World
examples.name: _Hello_World
examples.description: An introduction into how to create AMPHTML ads.

examples.title: AMPHTML ads vs non-AMP ads
examples.name: AMPHTML_ads_vs_non-AMP_ads
examples.description: This sample compares the performance of an AMPHTML ad vs a regular ad.

examples.description: Sample AMPHTML ad using amp-carousel to display a slide-show style ad.

examples.title: Video Ad

examples.description: Sample AMPHTML ad using amp-video to display a video ad with layers and playback control.
